channel.title: Stating the Blackmark varible
channel.description: Does somone have the code needed to make certain stuff reconize the varible "Blackmarks" My blackmarks.txt is located in the data section of the source folder.

item.title: Stating the Blackmark varible
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

No it didnt. I added the command myself and what-not for the starter.
Jorascape (Pimpscape) Is the source i am using but iv been using it for ever, and it is hardly reconizible. Its i get a error when i compile

client.java:9221: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable blackmark
location: class client
blackmark +=1;
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Stating the Blackmark varible
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Well what source are you using? And what do you mean by ‘stuff’. If the server came like that I don’t think you should have to do anything, but if you added the blackmarks.txt you have to code the server to read and make use of it.
